name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
instructions: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice it.
Spread Caesar dressing on the tortilla.
Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan.
Wrap tightly and serve.

name: Greek Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook the quinoa according to the package instructions.
Chop the cucumber and red onion.
Mix quinoa, cucumber, onion, olives, and feta.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, then toss.

name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
instructions: Mix tuna, mayonnaise, lemon juice, and diced celery.
Spread the mixture on a slice of bread.
Top with lettuce and place the other slice of bread on top.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
instructions: Chop the bell peppers and carrot.
Sauté the garlic in olive oil.
Add the vegetables and tofu to the pan.
Drizzle with soy sauce and stir-fry until the vegetables are tender.

name: Avocado Chicken Salad
instructions: Grill the chicken breast and slice it.
Chop the avocado, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.
Toss all the ingredients with olive oil and lemon juice.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: Cut the broccoli into florets.
Sauté the garlic and ginger in olive oil.
Add the beef strips and stir-fry until browned.
Add broccoli and soy sauce, cook until broccoli is tender.

name: Chicken and Avocado Wrap
instructions: Grill the chicken and slice it.
Spread the yogurt on the tortilla.
Add chicken, avocado, and lettuce.
Wrap tightly and serve.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Chop the carrots, celery, and onion.
Sauté the garlic and onion.
Add the lentils, vegetables, and stock, simmer until lentils are soft.

name: Chicken and Spinach Salad
instructions: Grill the chicken and slice it.
Toss the spinach with olive oil.
Top with chicken, feta cheese, and walnuts.

name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Burrito
instructions: Roast the sweet potato until tender.
Mash the black beans and avocado together.
Spread the mixture on the tortilla.
Add the sweet potato and salsa, then wrap and serve.

name: Grilled Chicken and Veggie Bowl
instructions: Grill the chicken until cooked through and slice.
Cook quinoa according to the package instructions.
Grill the zucchini and bell peppers, then chop.
Combine chicken, quinoa, and vegetables in a bowl. Drizzle with olive oil.

name: Falafel Wrap
instructions: Heat the falafel according to package instructions.
Spread hummus inside the pita.
Fill with falafel, chopped cucumber, tomatoes, and lettuce.

name: Shrimp Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic.
Add shrimp and stir-fry until pink.
Add broccoli and carrots, then drizzle with soy sauce. Cook until tender.

name: Turkey and Avocado Sandwich
instructions: Spread mayonnaise on one slice of bread.
Layer turkey, avocado slices, and lettuce on the bread.
Top with the second slice and serve.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella.
Layer tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil leaves on a plate.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

name: Chickpea and Spinach Stew
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add chickpeas and spinach, then stir in the tomato paste.
Simmer until the spinach is wilted and the stew is heated through.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Slice the eggplant and sauté in olive oil until golden.
Layer eggplant, marinara sauce, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

name: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
instructions: Grill the salmon fillet until cooked through.
Drizzle asparagus with olive oil and grill until tender.
Serve the salmon with a squeeze of lemon.

name: Tofu Stir-Fry with Snow Peas
instructions: Cube the tofu and sauté in sesame oil until golden.
Add garlic, snow peas, and carrots. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender.
Drizzle with soy sauce and serve.

name: Quinoa and Roasted Veggie Salad
instructions: Roast sweet potato, zucchini, and bell peppers until tender.
Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Mix roasted vegetables and quinoa. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.

name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
instructions: Rinse and drain the chickpeas.
Chop cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and parsley.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl, drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, and toss.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F).
Spread BBQ sauce on the pizza dough.
Top with grilled chicken, sliced red onion, and mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, then garnish with cilantro before serving.

name: Shrimp Tacos with Cabbage Slaw
instructions: Sauté shrimp with olive oil and chili powder until cooked.
Mix shredded cabbage with lime juice and cilantro.
Serve shrimp in corn tortillas topped with cabbage slaw.

name: Roasted Vegetable Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Chop vegetables and toss them in olive oil.
Roast vegetables for 20-25 minutes.
Cook quinoa according to package instructions and mix with roasted vegetables and balsamic vinegar.

name: Spicy Black Bean Burrito
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Heat black beans and mix with salsa.
Spread rice, beans, cheese, and avocado on the tortilla and roll into a burrito.
Garnish with cilantro before serving.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Slice eggplant and sprinkle with salt. Let sit for 30 minutes, then rinse.
Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Sauté eggplant in olive oil until golden.
Layer eggplant, marinara sauce, mozzarella, and parmesan in a baking dish.
Bake for 20 minutes and top with fresh basil before serving.

name: Curried Lentil Salad
instructions: Cook lentils according to package instructions and let cool.
Chop carrot, red onion, and cucumber.
Mix lentils with chopped vegetables, olive oil, lemon juice, and curry powder.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Slice chicken breast and sauté in olive oil until cooked.
Add chopped bell peppers, broccoli, ginger, and garlic.
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes and drizzle with soy sauce before serving.

name: Avocado Chicken Wrap
instructions: Cook and slice the chicken breast.
Mash the avocado and spread on the tortilla.
Add chicken, lettuce, sliced tomato, and mayonnaise.
Roll the tortilla and serve.

name: Falafel Wrap with Hummus
instructions: Warm the falafel in a pan or oven.
Spread hummus on the tortilla.
Add falafel, sliced cucumber, tomato, and lettuce.
Wrap the tortilla and serve.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and cook garlic and ginger.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Add broccoli and soy sauce, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.

name: Salmon Caesar Salad
instructions: Cook the salmon fillet in a pan or oven.
Chop the romaine lettuce and mix with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons, Parmesan, and top with cooked salmon and a lemon wedge.

name: Vegetarian Pad Thai
instructions: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Stir-fry tofu and green onions in a pan with soy sauce.
Toss noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts.
Serve with a lime wedge.

name: Turkey Avocado Salad
instructions: Slice the turkey breast and avocado.
Toss mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, olive oil, and lemon juice.
Top the salad with turkey and avocado slices.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until golden, then add red pepper flakes.
Toss cooked spaghetti in the garlic oil and top with chopped parsley and Parmesan.

name: Greek Chicken Souvlaki
instructions: Marinate chicken thighs in yogurt, garlic, and lemon juice.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
Serve with pita bread, sliced cucumber, and extra yogurt as a dip.

name: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Cook quinoa and mix with black beans, corn, and olive oil.
Slice the tops off the bell peppers and remove the seeds.
Stuff the peppers with the quinoa mixture and top with cheese.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20 minutes.

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
instructions: Sauté spinach with garlic and olive oil.
Slice the chicken breast in half and stuff with spinach and feta.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 25 minutes.

name: Shrimp Tacos with Mango Salsa
instructions: Cook the shrimp in a pan for 5 minutes.
Dice the mango and red onion, and mix with chopped cilantro and lime juice to create the salsa.
Warm the tortillas and assemble the tacos with shrimp and mango salsa.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot and sauté garlic, onion, carrot, and celery.
Add lentils and vegetable stock, bring to a boil.
Simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are tender.

name: Chicken Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Cook chicken breast and slice into strips.
Toss pasta with pesto, cherry tomatoes, and cooked chicken.
Top with grated Parmesan.

name: Quinoa Chickpea Salad
instructions: Cook the quinoa and let it cool.
Mix cooked quinoa with chickpeas, diced cucumber, tomato, and red onion.
Dress with olive oil and lemon juice.

name: Tuna Niçoise Salad
instructions: Boil potatoes and green beans until tender.
Mix tuna, boiled eggs, green beans, olives, tomatoes, and potatoes.
Drizzle with olive oil and serve.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Slice eggplant and bake with olive oil for 20 minutes.
Layer eggplant with tomato sauce, mozzarella, Parmesan, and breadcrumbs.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 25 minutes.

name: Grilled Vegetable Sandwich
instructions: Grill zucchini, bell peppers, and eggplant until tender.
Spread pesto on ciabatta bread, add grilled vegetables, and top with mozzarella.
Grill the sandwich until cheese melts.

name: Baked Sweet Potatoes with Black Beans
instructions: Bake the sweet potatoes at 180°C (350°F) for 40 minutes.
Heat the black beans and mash the avocado.
Top the baked sweet potatoes with black beans, avocado, sour cream, and cilantro.

name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté zucchini, asparagus, and cherry tomatoes in olive oil.
Toss the cooked pasta with the vegetables and top with Parmesan.

name: Chickpea and Spinach Curry
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in a pan until soft.
Add chickpeas, spinach, and curry powder, then pour in coconut milk.
Simmer for 15 minutes until thickened.

name: Turkey and Avocado Wrap
instructions: Spread mayonnaise on tortillas.
Add turkey slices, avocado slices, and lettuce.
Roll up the wraps and serve.

name: Salmon and Asparagus Salad
instructions: Grill the salmon and asparagus until cooked.
Toss the mixed greens with olive oil and lemon juice.
Top the salad with grilled salmon and asparagus.

name: Chickpea and Couscous Bowl
instructions: Cook the couscous according to package instructions.
Mix couscous with chickpeas, diced cucumber, tomato, and feta cheese.
Dress with olive oil and serve.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
instructions: Sauté tofu in a pan until crispy.
Add chopped vegetables, garlic, and ginger.
Pour in soy sauce and stir-fry until vegetables are tender.

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill the chicken breast and slice it.
Chop the romaine lettuce and toss with Caesar dressing.
Top with grilled chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
instructions: Mix the pulled pork with BBQ sauce.
Toast the burger buns and add the BBQ pulled pork.
Top with coleslaw and serve.

name: Falafel Pita Sandwich
instructions: Warm the pita bread and place falafel inside.
Add diced cucumber and tomato.
Drizzle with tahini sauce and serve.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter.
Add Arborio rice and cook for a minute.
Slowly add vegetable broth while stirring until rice is creamy.
Top with Parmesan and serve.

name: Chicken Shawarma Bowl
instructions: Cook the rice according to package instructions.
Grill marinated chicken thighs and slice.
Serve chicken over rice with diced cucumber, tomato, and garlic sauce.

name: Zucchini Fritters
instructions: Grate the zucchini and squeeze out excess water.
Mix zucchini with egg, flour, and feta cheese.
Fry spoonfuls of the mixture in olive oil until golden brown.

name: Pesto Pasta Salad
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Mix cooked pasta with pesto, halved cherry tomatoes, and olive oil.
Top with grated Parmesan cheese and serve.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Mix cooked quinoa with diced cucumber, halved cherry tomatoes, and feta.
Drizzle with olive oil and serve.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté chopped onions, carrots, and celery until soft.
Add lentils and vegetable broth, bring to a boil.
Simmer until lentils are tender and serve.

name: Caprese Sandwich
instructions: Slice the ciabatta bread and layer with mozzarella, tomato, and basil.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and close the sandwich.
Serve fresh.

name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Sauté chopped onion until translucent.
Add mixed vegetables and curry powder, cook for a few minutes.
Pour in coconut milk, simmer until vegetables are tender.
Serve with cooked rice.

name: Smoked Salmon Bagel
instructions: Spread cream cheese on bagel halves.
Layer with smoked salmon, capers, and thinly sliced red onion.
Serve open-faced.

name: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Drain and rinse chickpeas.
Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion.
Mix everything in a bowl and drizzle with lemon juice.
Serve chilled.

name: Buffalo Cauliflower Wrap
instructions: Break cauliflower into florets and toss with buffalo sauce.
Bake until crispy.
Serve in tortilla wraps with lettuce and ranch dressing.

name: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
instructions: Slice zucchini in half and scoop out seeds.
Mix ground turkey with tomato sauce and seasoning.
Stuff the zucchini with the mixture and top with cheese.
Bake until zucchini is tender.

name: Turkey and Avocado Wrap
instructions: Spread mayonnaise on the tortilla.
Layer turkey, sliced avocado, and spinach on top.
Roll the tortilla tightly and slice in half to serve.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Mix cooked quinoa with black beans, corn, and diced bell pepper.
Garnish with chopped cilantro before serving.

name: Chicken Fajita Rice Bowl
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Sauté sliced chicken, bell pepper, and onion with fajita seasoning.
Serve the chicken mixture over rice.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries in a bowl.
Drizzle with honey before serving.

name: Shrimp Tacos
instructions: Sauté shrimp until cooked through.
Warm corn tortillas in a pan.
Assemble tacos with shrimp, shredded cabbage, and a dollop of sour cream.
Serve with lime wedges.

name: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Scramble eggs in a pan and set aside.
Sauté green peas and chopped green onion.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce, mix well.
Stir in scrambled eggs and serve.

name: Chickpea Buddha Bowl
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions.
Drain and rinse chickpeas.
Layer spinach, cooked rice, chickpeas, and sliced avocado in a bowl.
Drizzle with tahini before serving.

name: Cajun Chicken Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Season chicken with Cajun seasoning and sauté until cooked.
Add cream and cooked pasta to the pan, mix well.
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Chop cucumber and halve cherry tomatoes.
Mix cooked quinoa with cucumber, tomatoes, and feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: Slice the beef thinly and stir-fry with garlic and ginger.
Add broccoli and soy sauce, cook until beef is tender.
Serve hot.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Slice the eggplant and bread it with breadcrumbs.
Bake the eggplant slices, then layer with tomato sauce and cheese.
Bake until golden and bubbly.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Slice the chicken, peppers, and onions.
Sauté with fajita seasoning until chicken is cooked through.
Serve in warm tortillas.

name: Quinoa Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Cook the quinoa and mix with black beans, corn, and cheese.
Stuff the mixture into the bell peppers and bake until tender.

name: Shrimp Tacos
instructions: Cook the shrimp in a pan until pink and firm.
Assemble the tacos with shrimp, cabbage, and sour cream.
Squeeze lime juice over the tacos and serve.

name: Spinach and Ricotta Cannelloni
instructions: Mix spinach and ricotta for the filling.
Stuff the cannelloni tubes with the filling.
Cover with tomato sauce and bake until cooked through.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
instructions: Grill the chicken thighs and glaze with teriyaki sauce.
Steam the broccoli and carrots.
Serve chicken and vegetables over rice.

name: Pesto Chicken Pasta Salad
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions and drain.
In a bowl, combine cooked pasta, shredded chicken, and pesto sauce.
Add halved cherry tomatoes and mix well.
Top with grated Parmesan cheese before serving.

name: Caprese Sandwich
instructions: Slice ciabatta bread in half and layer with fresh mozzarella and sliced tomatoes.
Add fresh basil leaves and drizzle with balsamic glaze.
Close the sandwich and enjoy.

name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Tacos
instructions: Roast sweet potatoes in the oven until tender.
Warm corn tortillas in a skillet.
Mash avocado and spread on the tortillas.
Top with roasted sweet potatoes and black beans.
Serve with lime wedges.
tags: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Tacos

name: Buffalo Chicken Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Mix cooked quinoa with shredded chicken and buffalo sauce.
Chop celery and add to the bowl.
Drizzle with blue cheese dressing before serving.

name: Zaatar Chicken Flatbread
instructions: Season chicken with zaatar spice and grill until cooked.
Slice the grilled chicken and layer on flatbread.
Top with yogurt and sliced cucumber before serving.

name: Curry Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté diced onion and carrot in a pot until soft.
Add red lentils, coconut milk, and curry powder.
Simmer until lentils are tender, then blend for a smooth texture.

name: Vegetable Sushi Rolls
instructions: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions and let cool.
Slice cucumber and avocado into thin strips.
Lay a nori sheet on a bamboo mat, spread rice, and add cucumber and avocado.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces, serving with soy sauce.

name: Spicy Tuna Salad
instructions: Mix canned tuna, mayonnaise, and sriracha sauce in a bowl.
Chop celery and add to the mixture.
Serve the spicy tuna on lettuce leaves.

name: Egg Salad Sandwich
instructions: Chop hard-boiled eggs and mix with mayonnaise and mustard.
Spread the egg mixture on two slices of bread.
Top with lettuce and cover with remaining bread slices.

name: Teriyaki Salmon Bowl
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions.
Grill or pan-sear the salmon fillet and brush with teriyaki sauce.
Steam broccoli until tender.
Serve the salmon over rice, topped with broccoli and sesame seeds.

name: Mediterranean Chickpea Wrap
instructions: Rinse and drain chickpeas and mash slightly.
Chop red bell pepper and mix with chickpeas and olive oil.
Spread mixture onto whole wheat tortillas and sprinkle with feta cheese.
Wrap and slice in half.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cook brown rice according to package instructions.
Mix ground turkey, cooked rice, and tomato sauce in a bowl.
Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds.
Stuff the mixture into the bell peppers and top with cheddar cheese.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until the peppers are tender.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté chopped onion and mushrooms in a pan until soft.
Add Arborio rice and cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly.
Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring until absorbed.
Once creamy, stir in grated Parmesan cheese and serve.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: In a glass or bowl, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries.
Drizzle honey on top and serve immediately.

name: Shrimp and Avocado Salad
instructions: In a bowl, combine cooked shrimp, diced avocado, and mixed greens.
Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil, then toss gently before serving.

name: Veggie Burger
instructions: Mash black beans in a bowl and add oats, chopped onion, and minced garlic.
Form mixture into patties and cook in a skillet until golden.
Serve on whole wheat buns.

name: Smashed Chickpea Salad Sandwich
instructions: Mash chickpeas in a bowl and mix in mayonnaise, chopped celery, and mustard.
Spread the mixture onto slices of whole grain bread and make a sandwich.

name: Caprese Pasta Salad
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions and let cool.
Halve cherry tomatoes and mozzarella balls.
In a bowl, combine pasta, tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar before serving.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the whole grain bread until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and mix with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toasted bread and serve.

name: Oatmeal with Berries
instructions: In a pot, bring water to a boil and add rolled oats.
Cook on low heat for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Once thickened, stir in mixed berries and honey.
Serve warm with milk.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Pour in the egg mixture and stir gently until just set.
Serve immediately.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: In a glass, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries.
Drizzle with honey on top.
Serve immediately.

name: Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend banana, spinach, and almond milk until smooth.
Pour the smoothie into a bowl and top with chia seeds and granola.
Serve immediately.

name: French Toast
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, and cinnamon.
Dip each slice of bread into the mixture, coating both sides.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat and cook each slice until golden.
Serve with syrup or fresh fruit.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana, peanut butter, milk, and honey until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.

name: Breakfast Burrito
instructions: Scramble the eggs in a skillet over medium heat.
Add diced bell pepper and cook until soft.
Place the scrambled eggs and cheese on each tortilla, top with salsa, and roll up.
Serve warm.

name: Cottage Cheese Bowl
instructions: In a bowl, combine cottage cheese and pineapple.
Sprinkle with chia seeds and drizzle with honey.
Serve immediately.

name: Banana Pancakes
instructions: Mash the banana in a bowl and add the egg, oats, baking powder, and cinnamon.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and pour in the batter.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.
Serve with maple syrup or fresh fruit.

name: Chia Pudding
instructions: In a bowl, mix chia seeds, almond milk, honey, and vanilla extract.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight until it thickens.
Serve topped with mixed berries.

name: Egg and Avocado Breakfast Sandwich
instructions: Toast the whole wheat bread until golden brown.
Cook the egg in a skillet to your liking.
Mash the avocado and season with salt and pepper.
Assemble the sandwich by spreading avocado on one slice, topping with the egg, and covering with the other slice.

name: Breakfast Quinoa Bowl
instructions: In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa and almond milk.
Drizzle with maple syrup and mix well.
Top with sliced banana and chopped walnuts.

name: Egg Muffins
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F) and grease a muffin tin.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs and season with salt.
Add chopped spinach, diced bell pepper, and cheese to the egg mixture.
Pour the mixture into muffin cups and bake for 20-25 minutes until set.

name: Savory Oatmeal
instructions: In a pot, bring water to a boil and add rolled oats.
Cook for 5 minutes until thickened, then stir in spinach.
In a separate skillet, fry the egg to your liking.
Serve the oatmeal topped with the fried egg and season with salt.

name: Cinnamon Roll Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana, cinnamon, rolled oats, milk, and honey until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.

name: Breakfast Hash
instructions: Dice the potatoes, bell pepper, and onion.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and add the diced vegetables.
Cook until the potatoes are tender, about 10-15 minutes.
Crack the eggs on top and cover until cooked to your liking.

name: Peanut Butter Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, peanut butter, milk, honey, and ice.
Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
instructions: Toast the whole wheat bread until golden.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Poach the egg in simmering water for about 3-4 minutes.
Spread the avocado on the toast and top with the poached egg.

name: Muesli with Yogurt and Fruits
instructions: In a bowl, layer the rolled oats, yogurt, and mixed berries.
Drizzle honey over the top and sprinkle with almonds.
Serve immediately.

name: Spinach and Feta Omelette
instructions: In a bowl, whisk the eggs and season with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and add spinach, cooking until wilted.
Pour in the eggs and cook until edges are set.
Sprinkle feta cheese on one half and fold the omelette over.

name: Apple Cinnamon Overnight Oats
instructions: In a jar, combine rolled oats, almond milk, diced apple, cinnamon, and honey.
Stir well and refrigerate overnight.
Enjoy cold or warm it up in the morning.

name: Protein Smoothie Bowl
instructions: In a blender, combine protein powder, banana, almond milk, and peanut butter.
Blend until smooth and pour into a bowl.
Top with granola.

name: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Nuts
instructions: In a bowl, place Greek yogurt and drizzle with honey.
Sprinkle walnuts, almonds, and cinnamon on top.
Serve immediately.

name: Raspberry Almond Chia Pudding
instructions: In a bowl, mix chia seeds, almond milk, honey, and raspberries.
Stir well and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Serve topped with sliced almonds.

name: Savory Breakfast Muffins
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a bowl, mix flour and baking powder.
In another bowl, whisk eggs and milk, then add spinach and cheese.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients and pour into muffin tins.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden.

name: Coconut Banana Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, mash the banana and mix with coconut flour, eggs, and milk.
Heat a non-stick skillet and pour in batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.
Serve with maple syrup.

name: Breakfast Burrito
instructions: Scramble the eggs in a skillet over medium heat.
Add black beans and cheese, stirring until melted.
Place the egg mixture on the tortilla and top with salsa.
Roll up the tortilla and serve.

name: Fruit and Nut Oatmeal
instructions: In a pot, combine oats and almond milk, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for about 5 minutes.
Stir in dried fruits and nuts, then drizzle with honey before serving.

name: Banana Oatmeal Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, mash the banana and mix in rolled oats, egg, baking powder, and cinnamon.
Heat a non-stick skillet and pour in batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.

name: Tomato and Basil Frittata
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
In a bowl, whisk the eggs with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet, add tomatoes and basil, cooking briefly.
Pour in the eggs and cook until edges set, then transfer to the oven and bake for 10 minutes.

name: Cinnamon Roll Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine banana, oats, almond milk, cinnamon, and maple syrup.
Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Caprese Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the whole wheat bread until golden.
Mash the avocado and spread it on the toast.
Layer with slices of mozzarella and tomato, then top with basil leaves.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

name: Quinoa Breakfast Bowl
instructions: In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa and almond milk.
Top with chopped fruits, honey, and chia seeds.
Serve immediately.

name: Apple Cinnamon Overnight Oats
instructions: In a jar, combine rolled oats, almond milk, chopped apple, cinnamon, and maple syrup.
Mix well, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
In the morning, stir and enjoy.

name: Spinach and Feta Omelette
instructions: Whisk the eggs with salt and pepper in a bowl.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add spinach and cook until wilted, then pour in the eggs.
Sprinkle feta on top and cook until the eggs are set.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Toast
instructions: Toast the whole wheat bread.
Spread peanut butter on the toast.
Top with banana slices and sprinkle chia seeds on top.

name: Chia Seed Pudding
instructions: In a bowl, mix chia seeds, coconut milk, maple syrup, and vanilla extract.
Let sit for 10 minutes, then stir and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Serve topped with fresh berries.

name: Savory Breakfast Quinoa
instructions: In a skillet, heat olive oil and sauté spinach until wilted.
Add cooked quinoa and stir until heated through.
Fry the egg in a separate pan to your liking.
Top the quinoa mixture with the fried egg and crumbled feta.

name: Mango Coconut Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine mango, coconut yogurt, coconut milk, and honey.
Blend until smooth and serve chilled.

name: Cottage Cheese and Berry Bowl
instructions: In a bowl, add cottage cheese and top with mixed berries.
Drizzle honey over the top and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Sweet Potato Hash
instructions: Dice the sweet potato, bell pepper, and onion.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, add vegetables and sauté until tender.
Push the vegetables to the side, crack eggs into the skillet, and cook to your liking.

name: Savory Oatmeal with Eggs
instructions: Cook rolled oats in water until creamy.
Meanwhile, poach or fry the egg.
Stir spinach into the oatmeal until wilted, then season with salt and pepper.
Top the oatmeal with the egg and sprinkle cheese on top.

name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
instructions: Toast the whole grain bread.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Poach the egg in simmering water until the whites are set.
Spread the avocado on the toast and top with the poached egg.

name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend frozen berries, Greek yogurt, and banana until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with granola and chia seeds.

name: Pumpkin Spice Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, combine flour, pumpkin puree, egg, milk, baking powder, and pumpkin spice.
Heat a skillet and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, flip and cook until golden.
Serve warm with maple syrup.

name: Zucchini Fritters
instructions: Grate the zucchini and squeeze out excess moisture.
In a bowl, mix grated zucchini, egg, flour, cheese, salt, and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a skillet and drop spoonfuls of the mixture.
Fry until golden brown on both sides.

name: Breakfast Burrito
instructions: Scramble the eggs in a skillet.
Warm the tortilla in another skillet.
Layer scrambled eggs, black beans, cheese, avocado, and salsa on the tortilla.
Roll up the tortilla and enjoy.

name: Cinnamon Roll Smoothie
instructions: Blend rolled oats, banana, almond milk, cinnamon, and maple syrup until smooth.
Serve chilled, garnished with a sprinkle of cinnamon.

name: Egg and Veggie Muffins
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Whisk the eggs with salt and pepper.
Chop bell pepper and mix with spinach and cheese in a bowl.
Pour the egg mixture into a greased muffin tin, then add the veggies.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until the egg is set.

name: Blueberry Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer the Greek yogurt, blueberries, and granola in a glass.
Drizzle with honey and enjoy.

name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice and spread it on the toast.
Poach the egg and place it on top of the avocado toast.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes.

name: Spinach and Feta Omelette
instructions: Sauté spinach in olive oil until wilted.
Beat the eggs and pour them over the spinach.
Cook until the eggs are set, then crumble feta on top.
Fold the omelette and serve.

name: Banana Oat Pancakes
instructions: Blend the oats, banana, egg, baking powder, and cinnamon into a smooth batter.
Pour small amounts of batter onto a hot griddle and cook until golden on both sides.

name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend the berries, banana, yogurt, and almond milk until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with chia seeds.

name: Cottage Cheese and Berry Toast
instructions: Toast the bread until golden.
Spread cottage cheese on the toast.
Top with mixed berries and drizzle with honey.

name: Chia Seed Pudding
instructions: Mix the chia seeds, almond milk, maple syrup, and vanilla in a jar.
Refrigerate overnight until the mixture thickens into a pudding.

name: Veggie Breakfast Burrito
instructions: Sauté the bell pepper and spinach in a pan.
Scramble the eggs and add to the pan.
Fill the tortilla with the scrambled mixture and top with cheddar cheese.
Wrap the tortilla to make a burrito.

name: Tomato and Avocado Bagel
instructions: Toast the bagel until golden.
Spread cream cheese on the bagel.
Top with sliced avocado and tomato.

name: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
instructions: Cook the oats with almond milk over medium heat until thickened.
Top with chopped apples, cinnamon, and drizzle with maple syrup.

name: Almond Butter Banana Toast
instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Spread almond butter over the toast.
Top with banana slices and sprinkle with chia seeds.

name: Egg White Scramble with Spinach
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté spinach until wilted.
Add halved cherry tomatoes and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in egg whites and scramble until cooked through.

name: Overnight Oats with Peanut Butter
instructions: Mix the oats, almond milk, peanut butter, chia seeds, and maple syrup in a jar.
Refrigerate overnight.
Stir before serving in the morning.

name: Scrambled Tofu with Veggies
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté diced bell pepper and onion.
Crumble tofu into the pan and sprinkle with turmeric.
Cook until tofu is heated through and golden.

name: Buckwheat Pancakes
instructions: Mix the buckwheat flour, egg, almond milk, and baking powder into a smooth batter.
Pour small amounts of the batter onto a hot griddle and cook until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip and cook the other side until golden brown.

name: Coconut Chia Pudding
instructions: Mix the chia seeds, coconut milk, vanilla extract, and honey in a jar.
Refrigerate overnight.
Stir before serving and top with fruits or nuts if desired.

name: Green Smoothie
instructions: Blend spinach, banana, almond milk, flaxseeds, and peanut butter until smooth.
Pour into a glass and serve.

name: Quinoa Breakfast Bowl
instructions: Warm the cooked quinoa in a saucepan with almond milk.
Transfer to a bowl and top with blueberries, maple syrup, and chia seeds.

name: Egg Muffins with Veggies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Whisk the eggs and stir in diced bell pepper, spinach, and cheese.
Grease a muffin tin with olive oil and pour the mixture into the molds.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until set.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer the Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries in a glass.
Drizzle with honey and serve.

name: Sweet Potato Breakfast Hash
instructions: Peel and dice the sweet potato and sauté it in olive oil.
Add chopped bell pepper and onion and cook until softened.
Fry eggs in the same pan and serve on top of the hash.

name: Pumpkin Spice Smoothie
instructions: Blend all the ingredients together until smooth.
Serve cold, garnished with a dash of cinnamon.

name: Mushroom and Feta Omelette
instructions: Sauté mushrooms in olive oil until soft.
Beat eggs and pour them into the pan with mushrooms.
Sprinkle feta cheese and parsley on top before folding the omelette.

name: Blueberry Chia Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend blueberries, banana, and almond milk into a thick smoothie.
Pour into a bowl, top with chia seeds and granola, and serve.

name: Sourdough French Toast
instructions: Whisk the egg, milk, and cinnamon together.
Soak the sourdough slices in the mixture and cook on a hot griddle until golden.
Serve with maple syrup.

name: Peach Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer Greek yogurt with peach slices and granola in a glass.
Drizzle honey on top and serve.

name: Coconut Banana Pancakes
instructions: Mash the banana and mix with egg, coconut flour, and baking powder.
Cook spoonfuls of batter on a hot griddle with coconut oil until golden brown.

name: Tomato and Basil Frittata
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté halved cherry tomatoes.
Whisk eggs and pour them into the pan, then top with basil and Parmesan.
Cook until set and serve hot.

name: Cottage Cheese and Avocado Toast
instructions: Spread cottage cheese over toasted whole grain bread.
Top with sliced avocado, drizzle with lemon juice, and sprinkle chia seeds.

name: Apple Cinnamon Overnight Oats
instructions: Mix oats, almond milk, cinnamon, and maple syrup in a jar.
Add chopped apple, cover, and refrigerate overnight.

name: Savory Oatmeal with Spinach and Eggs
instructions: Cook the rolled oats in vegetable broth until creamy.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
Fry an egg and serve on top of the oatmeal.

name: Chocolate Banana Protein Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Serve immediately for a quick breakfast.

name: Avocado Egg Salad
instructions: Hard boil the eggs, then chop them.
Mash avocado and mix with eggs, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Serve on toast or eat alone.

name: Zucchini Fritters
instructions: Grate zucchini and mix with egg, flour, and Parmesan.
Form into patties and fry in olive oil until golden brown.

name: Cinnamon Raisin Bagel with Cream Cheese
instructions: Toast the bagel and spread cream cheese on top.
Drizzle with honey and sprinkle with walnuts.

name: Berry Chia Seed Pudding
instructions: Mix chia seeds with almond milk and honey, and refrigerate overnight.
Top with mixed berries before serving.

name: Tofu Scramble
instructions: Crumble the tofu and sauté in olive oil with turmeric and salt.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.

name: Breakfast Burrito
instructions: Scramble the eggs with chopped bell pepper.
Place the mixture on the tortilla, top with cheese and salsa, and wrap it up.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Overnight Oats
instructions: Combine oats, almond milk, peanut butter, and honey in a jar.
Add sliced banana, cover, and refrigerate overnight.

name: Spinach and Feta Omelette
instructions: Whisk the eggs in a bowl with salt.
Heat olive oil in a pan, add spinach and cook until wilted.
Pour the eggs over the spinach, sprinkle with feta, and cook until set.

name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend the frozen berries, banana, and Greek yogurt until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with granola and a drizzle of honey.

name: Pumpkin Spice Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, and pumpkin spice in a bowl.
Add pumpkin puree and milk, stirring until combined.
Cook pancakes on a griddle until golden brown.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and fresh berries in a glass.
Drizzle honey on top before serving.

name: Egg and Avocado Breakfast Wrap
instructions: Scramble eggs in a pan and season with salt.
Mash avocado and spread on the tortilla.
Add scrambled eggs and sliced tomato, then wrap it up.

name: Peach and Almond Overnight Oats
instructions: Mix rolled oats, almond milk, and maple syrup in a jar.
Top with sliced peach and almonds, cover, and refrigerate overnight.

name: Coconut Mango Chia Pudding
instructions: Combine chia seeds and coconut milk in a bowl and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
Top with diced mango and drizzle with honey before serving.

name: Raspberry Almond Butter Toast
instructions: Toast the whole grain bread.
Spread almond butter on the toast and top with raspberries and a drizzle of honey.

name: Quinoa Breakfast Bowl
instructions: Mix cooked quinoa with almond milk and heat slightly.
Top with sliced banana, chia seeds, and a drizzle of honey.

name: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
instructions: Cook rolled oats in almond milk over medium heat.
Add chopped apple, cinnamon, and honey, stir well and serve warm.

name: Sweet Potato and Kale Hash
instructions: Cube the sweet potato and sauté in olive oil until soft.
Add kale and cook until wilted.
Fry eggs in a separate pan and serve on top of the hash.

name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
instructions: Toast the bread and mash the avocado onto it.
Poach the eggs and place them on top of the avocado toast.
Season with salt and red pepper flakes.

name: Blueberry Chia Pudding
instructions: Mix chia seeds and coconut milk in a jar, stir well, and refrigerate overnight.
Top with blueberries and a drizzle of maple syrup before serving.

name: Protein-Packed Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté spinach until wilted.
Whisk eggs with cottage cheese and salt, then pour into the pan and scramble until cooked.

name: Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana, peanut butter, almond milk, honey, and ice cubes until smooth.
Serve immediately.

name: Zucchini and Feta Frittata
instructions: Slice zucchini and sauté in olive oil until soft.
Whisk eggs with salt, then pour into the pan and add crumbled feta.
Cook until set and golden.

name: Quinoa and Egg Breakfast Bowl
instructions: Cook eggs sunny-side-up in olive oil.
In a bowl, layer cooked quinoa, sliced avocado, and tomato.
Top with the fried eggs and serve warm.

name: Almond Flour Banana Pancakes
instructions: Mash banana and mix with almond flour, eggs, and baking powder.
Cook pancakes in a non-stick pan until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with a drizzle of maple syrup.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass.
Top with a drizzle of honey and serve chilled.

name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken breasts in lemon juice, minced garlic, olive oil, and parsley for 30 minutes.
Grill until cooked through and serve with a side salad.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crispy, then mix with cooked spaghetti, beaten eggs, and grated Parmesan.
Season with black pepper and serve hot.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok and sauté minced garlic and ginger.
Add beef strips and stir-fry until browned.
Toss in sliced bell peppers and soy sauce, cooking until peppers are tender.

name: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C.
Drizzle olive oil over the salmon fillets and asparagus, and season with salt.
Place on a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes.
Serve with lemon wedges.

name: Vegetable Pad Thai
instructions: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Sauté tofu until golden, then add carrots and bean sprouts.
Mix peanut butter, soy sauce, and lime juice, then toss with the noodles and vegetables.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and garam masala for 30 minutes.
Sauté the chicken in a pan, then add tomato sauce and simmer until cooked through.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp, white wine, and lemon juice, cooking until shrimp are pink.
Garnish with parsley and serve over pasta.

name: Vegetarian Burrito Bowl
instructions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions.
Layer rice, black beans, corn, avocado, salsa, and lettuce in a bowl and serve.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning until browned.
Fill tortillas with beef, cheese, lettuce, and a dollop of sour cream.

name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Sauté sweet potatoes in a pan until tender.
Add chickpeas, coconut milk, and curry powder, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in spinach and serve with rice.

name: Teriyaki Chicken
instructions: Marinate the chicken thighs in teriyaki sauce for 30 minutes.
Cook chicken in a pan until caramelized and cooked through.
Serve with rice and garnish with sesame seeds and sliced spring onions.

name: Lentil Stew
instructions: Sauté chopped onions, garlic, and carrots in a pot.
Add red lentils and vegetable broth, and simmer for 25 minutes until lentils are tender.
Season and serve hot.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Brown ground turkey in a pan and mix with cooked quinoa and tomato sauce.
Stuff the bell peppers with the mixture, top with cheddar cheese, and bake for 20 minutes at 180°C.

name: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
instructions: Cook penne pasta according to package instructions.
Toss with basil pesto, halved cherry tomatoes, and olive oil.
Top with grated Parmesan and serve.

name: Baked Cod with Lemon Butter
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C.
Place cod fillets on a baking sheet and drizzle with melted butter, lemon juice, and minced garlic.
Bake for 12-15 minutes and garnish with parsley before serving.

name: Vegetarian Chili
instructions: Sauté chopped onions and bell peppers in a pot.
Add kidney beans, black beans, tomato sauce, and chili powder, then simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with toppings like cheese or sour cream.

name: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté garlic and mushrooms in olive oil until softened.
Add arborio rice and stir for a minute before gradually adding vegetable broth.
Stir continuously until the rice is creamy and tender, then stir in Parmesan cheese.

name: Spinach and Ricotta Cannelloni
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix ricotta and spinach together and stuff the cannelloni tubes.
Place in a baking dish, cover with tomato sauce and mozzarella, and bake for 25 minutes.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef strips in butter until browned.
Add sliced mushrooms and onion and cook until softened.
Stir in beef broth and sour cream, simmering until thickened. Serve over noodles or rice.

name: Zucchini Noodles with Marinara Sauce
instructions: Spiralize the zucchini into noodles and set aside.
Sauté garlic in olive oil and add marinara sauce to heat through.
Toss zucchini noodles with the sauce and serve topped with Parmesan.

name: Honey Garlic Salmon
instructions: In a small bowl, mix honey, minced garlic, soy sauce, and olive oil.
Marinate salmon fillets in the sauce for 20 minutes.
Cook salmon in a pan over medium heat for 4-5 minutes per side, until caramelized and cooked through.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. In a bowl, whisk eggs and Parmesan together.
Toss the spaghetti with the egg mixture, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken breast in yogurt, garam masala, and salt for 30 minutes.
Cook onions in a pan until golden, add tomato puree and marinated chicken.
Simmer for 20 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté minced garlic, then add shrimp and cook until pink.
Add lemon juice and toss the shrimp with the spaghetti.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning in a pan.
Fill taco shells with beef, shredded lettuce, cheese, and sour cream.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry the vegetables in sesame oil for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for an additional 2 minutes.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Cook chicken, bell peppers, and onions in a pan with fajita seasoning.
Serve in warm tortillas with sour cream.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: Sauté beef strips in sesame oil until browned.
Add broccoli and garlic, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Pour soy sauce over the stir-fry and cook for another 2 minutes.

name: Baked Lemon Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, and thyme. Pour over chicken thighs and bake for 25-30 minutes until golden.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Cook ground beef and mix with cooked rice and tomato sauce. Stuff bell peppers with the mixture and bake for 25 minutes.
Top with cheese and bake for an additional 5 minutes.

name: Vegetarian Paella
instructions: In a pan, cook rice in vegetable broth with saffron until tender.
Add chopped bell peppers and green peas and cook until heated through.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Slice and bake the eggplant with olive oil for 15 minutes at 180°C.
Layer eggplant with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and Parmesan in a baking dish.
Bake for an additional 20 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.

name: Lamb Kofta
instructions: Mix ground lamb with minced garlic, cumin, coriander, and chopped onion.
Shape into koftas and grill for 10-12 minutes until cooked through.

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
instructions: Cut a pocket into each chicken breast.
Stuff with sautéed spinach, garlic, and feta cheese.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes until cooked through.

name: Teriyaki Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken thighs in soy sauce, honey, garlic, and sesame oil for 30 minutes.
Cook in a pan for 6-8 minutes per side until cooked through and caramelized.

name: Seafood Risotto
instructions: Cook Arborio rice with fish stock and white wine until creamy.
Add shrimp and mussels in the last 5 minutes of cooking and stir until seafood is cooked through.

name: Turkey Meatballs
instructions: Mix ground turkey with breadcrumbs, Parmesan, minced garlic, and egg.
Form into meatballs and bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

name: Grilled Salmon with Dill Sauce
instructions: Grill salmon fillets for 4-5 minutes per side.
Mix Greek yogurt, dill, lemon juice, and minced garlic for the sauce.
Serve salmon with dill sauce.

name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
instructions: Stir-fry chicken and bell peppers for 5 minutes.
Add pineapple, soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar.
Cook for an additional 5 minutes until sauce thickens.

name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan and black pepper.
Toss spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture, ensuring the eggs cook with the heat of the pasta.

name: Shrimp Tacos
instructions: Grill shrimp for 3-4 minutes until cooked.
Mash avocado and mix with lime juice.
Assemble tacos with shrimp, avocado, cabbage, and sour cream.

name: Mushroom Stroganoff
instructions: Sauté mushrooms and onions for 5 minutes.
Add minced garlic and vegetable broth, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in sour cream and cook until thickened.

name: Lentil Dahl
instructions: Sauté garlic and ginger with cumin and turmeric for 2 minutes.
Add red lentils and coconut milk, and simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are tender.

name: Beef Bourguignon
instructions: Brown beef in a pan for 5 minutes.
Add onions, carrots, and red wine, and simmer for 1 hour until beef is tender.
Add thyme and cook for 10 more minutes.

name: Butternut Squash Soup
instructions: Roast butternut squash for 25 minutes.
Sauté onion and garlic for 5 minutes, then add vegetable broth and roasted squash.
Blend until smooth and stir in coconut milk.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Slice eggplant and bake for 15 minutes.
Layer eggplant, tomato sauce, mozzarella, and Parmesan in a baking dish.
Top with breadcrumbs and bake for 20 minutes.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
instructions: Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic for 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook for 3-4 minutes until pink.
Stir in lemon juice and parsley, and serve.

name: Cajun Chicken Pasta
instructions: Cook penne pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté chicken with Cajun spice until cooked through.
Mix cooked pasta with chicken and heavy cream.
Top with Parmesan cheese before serving.

name: Moroccan Lamb Tagine
instructions: Brown lamb in a pot, then add spices and chickpeas.
Cover with water and simmer for 1 hour until tender.
Serve over couscous.

name: Pork Stir-Fry
instructions: Slice pork and sauté in sesame oil until browned.
Add broccoli and minced garlic, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, scramble the eggs, and set aside.
Stir-fry mixed vegetables for 3 minutes.
Add rice, soy sauce, and eggs, mixing thoroughly.
Garnish with chopped green onions.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Slice chicken, bell peppers, and onion.
Sauté in a pan with fajita seasoning until chicken is cooked.
Serve in warm tortillas.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Mix cooked rice, ground beef, and tomato sauce.
Stuff bell peppers with the mixture and top with cheese.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

name: Baked Ziti
instructions: Cook ziti pasta until al dente.
Mix cooked pasta with ricotta, tomato sauce, and Italian seasoning.
Transfer to a baking dish, top with mozzarella, and bake for 20 minutes.

name: Chicken Korma
instructions: Sauté onion until translucent, then add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in korma paste and coconut milk, simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve over cooked basmati rice.

name: Shrimp Tacos
instructions: Cook shrimp in a pan until pink.
Warm tortillas and fill with shrimp, cabbage, and sliced avocado.
Squeeze lime juice over tacos before serving.

name: Chickpea Curry
instructions: Sauté onion until golden, add curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add chickpeas and coconut milk, simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in spinach before serving.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms until soft.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Stir in sour cream and serve over cooked egg noodles.

name: Quinoa Salad with Black Beans
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Mix cooked quinoa with black beans, corn, lime juice, and cilantro.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

name: Teriyaki Salmon
instructions: Marinate salmon in teriyaki sauce for 30 minutes.
Cook rice according to package instructions.
Grill or bake salmon until cooked through.
Steam broccoli and serve with salmon, rice, and sprinkle sesame seeds on top.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Slice eggplant and bake until soft.
Layer eggplant, marinara sauce, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes until golden.
Garnish with fresh basil before serving.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Fill taco shells with cooked beef, lettuce, diced tomato, and cheese.
Serve with salsa if desired.

name: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onion and mushrooms until soft.
Add Arborio rice and stir for 2 minutes.
Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring until absorbed.
Finish with Parmesan cheese before serving.

name: Thai Green Curry
instructions: Slice chicken and cook in a pan until browned.
Add bell peppers and cook for 3 minutes.
Stir in green curry paste and coconut milk, simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve over cooked basmati rice.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
instructions: Layer cooked noodles, ricotta, spinach, marinara, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and top with mozzarella.
Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in butter, then add shrimp and cook until pink.
Toss with cooked spaghetti and garnish with parsley.

name: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
instructions: Halve zucchini and scoop out the centers.
Cook ground turkey with marinara and herbs.
Fill zucchini with turkey mixture and top with mozzarella.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

name: Pork Stir-Fry
instructions: Slice pork and cook in a pan until browned.
Add bell peppers and garlic, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and serve over rice.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté onion, carrot, and celery until soft.
Add lentils and vegetable broth, simmer for 30 minutes.
Blend if desired for a smooth texture.

name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté bell peppers and zucchini in olive oil.
Toss cooked pasta with sautéed vegetables and top with Parmesan.

name: Cajun Chicken Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté chicken with Cajun seasoning until cooked through.
Stir in cream and toss with pasta, finishing with Parmesan.

name: Baked Falafel
instructions: Blend chickpeas, parsley, cumin, and garlic until smooth.
Shape into balls and bake at 200°C for 25 minutes.
Serve in pita bread with salad.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Slice chicken, bell peppers, and onion.
Cook in a skillet with fajita seasoning until chicken is cooked through.
Serve in warm tortillas with your choice of toppings.

name: Baked Lemon Garlic Cod
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Place cod in a baking dish, drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, and parsley.
Bake for 20 minutes or until the fish is flaky.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Sauté vegetables in a pan until tender.
Add soy sauce and toss with vegetables.
Serve over cooked rice.

name: Pesto Pasta with Chicken
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté chicken until cooked through and slice.
Toss pasta with pesto, sliced chicken, and halved cherry tomatoes.
Serve topped with Parmesan cheese.

name: Mushroom and Spinach Quesadilla
instructions: Sauté mushrooms in olive oil until soft.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
Place mixture and cheese between two tortillas, cook on a skillet until golden.
Cut into wedges and serve.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté onion and mushrooms until soft, add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in sour cream, simmer, and serve over pasta.

name: Chickpea Curry
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
In a pan, combine chickpeas, coconut milk, curry powder, and spinach.
Simmer for 15 minutes and serve over rice.

name: Baked Sweet Potatoes with Black Beans
instructions: Bake sweet potatoes at 200°C for 45 minutes or until soft.
Heat black beans and corn together.
Top baked sweet potatoes with black beans, corn, diced avocado, and lime juice.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, heat olive oil, add sliced garlic, and red pepper flakes.
Toss with cooked spaghetti and chopped parsley.

name: Shrimp Tacos
instructions: Sauté shrimp until pink and cooked through.
Warm tortillas and fill with shrimp, shredded cabbage, and avocado.
Drizzle with lime juice before serving.

name: Teriyaki Salmon
instructions: Marinate salmon in teriyaki sauce for 15 minutes.
Cook salmon in a pan until flaky.
Serve with cooked rice, steamed broccoli, and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

name: Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Cook ground beef and mix with cooked rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff mixture into halved bell peppers and top with cheese.
Bake for 30 minutes.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Slice eggplant, salt it, and let sit for 30 minutes.
Rinse and layer eggplant slices with tomato sauce and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes and top with basil.

name: Honey Garlic Chicken
instructions: Mix honey, minced garlic, and soy sauce.
Marinate chicken thighs for at least 30 minutes.
Cook chicken in a skillet until cooked through.
Garnish with chopped green onions.

name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
instructions: Spiralize the zucchini to create noodles.
Sauté zucchini noodles in olive oil for 2-3 minutes.
Toss with pesto and halved cherry tomatoes.
Serve topped with grated Parmesan.

name: Pork Stir-Fry with Vegetables
instructions: Slice pork tenderloin and vegetables.
Stir-fry pork in a pan until browned.
Add vegetables and soy sauce; stir-fry until tender.
Serve hot.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté diced onion, carrots, and celery in a pot.
Add lentils and vegetable broth; bring to a boil.
Simmer for 30 minutes or until lentils are tender.

name: Beef and Broccoli
instructions: Sauté minced garlic and ginger in a pan.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Add broccoli and soy sauce, stir-fry until broccoli is tender.

name: Vegetarian Chili
instructions: Sauté diced onion and bell pepper in a pot.
Add beans and tomato sauce, simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with toppings of choice.

name: Teriyaki Tofu
instructions: Press and cube tofu, then sauté until golden.
Add teriyaki sauce, broccoli, and sliced carrots; cook until tender.
Serve with cooked rice.

name: Creamy Tuscan Chicken
instructions: Sauté minced garlic, add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in cream, spinach, and sun-dried tomatoes; simmer until thickened.
Serve hot.

name: Baked Lemon Cod
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Drizzle cod fillets with olive oil, lemon juice, and minced garlic.
Bake for 15-20 minutes; garnish with parsley.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Slice chicken, bell peppers, and onion.
Sauté chicken until cooked; add peppers and onion with seasoning.
Serve in warm tortillas.

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Chop cucumber and halved cherry tomatoes.
Mix cooked quinoa with vegetables and feta, drizzle with olive oil.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onion and mushrooms in a pot.
Add rice and gradually stir in broth until creamy.
Finish with Parmesan cheese.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill or cook chicken until fully cooked; slice.
Toss romaine lettuce with dressing, croutons, and chicken.
Top with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Shrimp Tacos
instructions: Sauté shrimp in a skillet until pink and cooked through.
Warm tortillas and fill with shrimp, cabbage, and avocado.
Squeeze lime juice over the tacos before serving.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Slice eggplant and salt to draw out moisture.
Layer eggplant, marinara sauce, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes; garnish with fresh basil.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Cook rice and brown ground beef in a skillet.
Mix rice, beef, and tomato sauce; stuff into bell peppers.
Top with cheddar cheese and bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Place salmon and asparagus on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Sprinkle dill on top and bake for 15-20 minutes.

name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté sliced vegetables in olive oil until tender.
Combine pasta with vegetables and top with Parmesan.

name: Chicken Cacciatore
instructions: Sauté onion and bell pepper in olive oil until softened.
Add chicken and brown on all sides.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Moroccan Chickpea Stew
instructions: Sauté chopped carrots in a pot until softened.
Add chickpeas, canned tomatoes, cumin, and cinnamon; simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with bread or rice.

name: Thai Green Curry
instructions: Sauté chicken in a pot until browned.
Add green curry paste and coconut milk; bring to a simmer.
Stir in sliced bell pepper and basil before serving.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Sauté tofu in a skillet until golden.
Add chopped vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour soy sauce over vegetables and serve hot.

name: Pork Chops with Apples
instructions: Season pork chops and sear in olive oil until browned.
Add sliced apples and onion; cook until soft.
Sprinkle thyme before serving.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté beef strips and mushrooms until browned.
Stir in sour cream and serve over pasta.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
instructions: Layer noodles, ricotta, spinach, zucchini, and marinara sauce in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and bake at 180°C for 30-40 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

name: BBQ Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Toss chicken with olive oil, BBQ sauce, garlic powder, and paprika.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until cooked through.
